ca.uqac.lif.petitpoucet.function.vector

Class ParameterizedVectorFunction

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.uqac.lif.dag.Node
      • ca.uqac.lif.petitpoucet.function.AtomicFunction
        • ca.uqac.lif.petitpoucet.function.vector.VectorFunction
          • ca.uqac.lif.petitpoucet.function.vector.VectorOutputFunction
            • ca.uqac.lif.petitpoucet.function.vector.ParameterizedVectorFunction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Connectable, Contextualizable, ExplanationQueryable, Function, Queryable, Duplicable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    VectorApply, Window

    public abstract class ParameterizedVectorFunction
extends VectorOutputFunction
    A function that applies another function repeatedly on elements of an input vector. The two notable descendants of this class are VectorApply and Window.
    Author:
    Sylvain Hallé

      • getSubNode

        protected NestedNode getSubNode(Part p,
                                int elem_index,
                                NodeFactory factory)
        Produces a NestedNode containing the explanation tree for the evaluation of a given instance of the inner function.
        Parameters:
        p - The part corresponding to the starting point
        elem_index - The index of the function instance
        factory - A factory to obtain node instances
        Returns:
        A nested node corresponding to the explanation tree
